resources.string: You can click Home button to use Your phone or Power button to turn off your screen (single short click) - flashlight all the same will give light. \n \n To turn off the flashlight you need to click Back button from the application.
Camera and flashlight are missing on Your device or are not responding. Application will be closed.
Starting and getting parameters of camera failure. Camera is not responding. Application will be closed.
You can\'t cancel the dialog with button Back. Click button OK in dialog.
